## CallbackResource class

Resource class to interact with [callbacks](https://community.onespan.com/documentation/onespan-sign/guides/feature-guides/developer/setting-callback-notifications)<!-- -->.

Callback event notifications allow you to be automatically notified of events pertaining to a package. Upon a specific event, the system will automatically call a specified URL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CallbackResource extends Resource 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Resource](./onespan-sign-node.resource.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get()](./onespan-sign-node.callbackresource.get.md) |  | Retrieve registered callback settings. |
|  [set(payload)](./onespan-sign-node.callbackresource.set.md) |  | Create/update callback settings. |
